name: Vanity URL for Go packages
summary:
Introduction If you have been working with Go programming language for a while, you would have noticed that a lot of open source packages that you import start with github.com/â€¦. You would then use go get command to download the package and add it to your go.mod file. For instance:
$ go get -u github.com/abvarun226/goiplookup What if you did not want this dependency on Github and rather wanted to host your own git server?
